about_the_game:
Wizard Realm is a challenging rogue-like with RPG elements where strategic thinking is key. Control a wizard in a fantastical world with 3D graphics. Explore realms with various monsters and use your magical skills to defeat them. Master your own skills with each attempt, learning the monster abilities and adapting to their tactics. Carefully select and combine items and skills to create powerful synergies and outmaneuver your foes. Team up with friends in co-op mode to defeat monsters together.

Skill System

The 21 different skills in the game are crucial for survival. Among these skills, there are 7 utility and 14 damage skills. Each skill can be upgraded through 3 tiers of empowerment. As you defeat monsters, you will be presented with three different skill options. Your survival strategy will depend on these options.

Item System

The game features a total of 125 unique items across four categories: Staff, Ring, Amulet, and Jewel. Each item boasts powerful attributes based on its rarity. Staves enhance your magical skills, while Rings, Amulets, and Jewels provide various benefits. Choose your items carefully to optimize your strategies.

Item Upgrade and Purchase

In the realms, immortal ghost wizards are waiting to share their skill knowledge and help you purchase items. You can use the souls of defeated monsters for transactions.
Additionally, you can use the souls you acquire to upgrade the rarity levels of your items, which will give you an advantage when you face off against monsters.

Character Upgrade

Craft colorful gems using the shards you collect from the realms to permanently strengthen your wizard. These powerful gems will better prepare you for upcoming battles.

Monsteropedia

The Monsteropedia book in the game informs you about the monsters you encounter. With 26 different monsters in the game, many of which have unique abilities, the book assists you in deciphering their characteristics after you’ve seen them.

Other Game Features

  • Multiplayer Co-op: Team up with friends to defeat monsters, enhancing your gameplay experience.
  • 2 Different Maps: Explore and conquer two unique maps, each with its own set of challenges and environments.
  • Catastrophe Events: Face challenging natural or magical disasters, such as meteor showers or blizzard storms, that test your adaptability and survival skills.
  • Steam Achievements and Leaderboards: Track your progress and compete with others through Steam achievements and leaderboards.
  • Selective Music: Immerse yourself in a soundtrack of carefully chosen music that enhances the atmosphere of your adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

short_description: Wizard Realm is a challenging rogue-like with RPG elements set in a fantastic 3D world. Craft strategies, master magical skills, equip powerful items, and fight against various types of monsters to survive. Team up with a friend to take down monsters together.
